title: Super Bowl LV Reaction
description:
Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti instantly react to the Buccaneers' lopsided victory over the Chiefs in Super Bowl LV by diving deep into the pressure Tampa Bay was able to put on Patrick Mahomes (01:05). Kevin and Nora also discuss their winners and losers from the game (17:20) and answer some listener questions (32:05).

Hosts: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
